name: Dementus Dementatus
description:
A short puzzle point-and-click game, where you battle against senile dementia while looking for your memories, using you "medication" to change your mental state and try, with all your might, to move amidst the fog in your mind. This is an entry for the  GOTO Game Jam 2022  --HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED--  --(SPOILER ALERT)-- WorkFlow and Concept art:
  • https://www.figma.com/file/AmD4KTZpjnucZGQdLysobz/Demens-Dementatus?node-id=0%3A...
Public repository:
  • https://github.com/R4nKF1v3/GOTOJam2022-Entry
